## ITerminalWritableOptions.terminal property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The [ITerminal](./node-core-library.iterminal.md) that the Writable will write to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
terminal: ITerminal;
```
